name: Water Station
description: A pump and concrete basin fed by underground source. The only reliable water for miles. Muddy ground around it. Always occupied or recently visited.
lighting_quality: Functional and unglamorous. Harsh midday light shows every detail. Mud reflects light strangely.
temperature_range: Cool near water, hot elsewhere. Evaporation creates microclimate.
acoustic_quality: Water dripping, splashing. Mud sucking at boots. Animals drinking. Wet sounds.
objects_present: Muddy ground with hoof prints and boot prints layered
atmosphere: Necessary and communal. A space that enforces cooperation.
